name: Soft Underbelly
description:
Soft Underbelly is a short narrative game about taking a break and having a stream-of-consciousness conversation with your cat about friendship, trust, and care. 

Inspired by my own working-from-home experiences. Made in two weeks for The Neighbourhood Jam 2020.

Play in browser, or download the Windows version below.
Mac build forthcoming!

Playtime
 Approx. 5-10 minutes, depending on your reading speed

Language
English

Audio/Music Credits
Calm Background Organ by PatrickLieberkind, Freesound.org
Cat Purr by soundmary, Freesound.org
Forest Ambient Loop by Imjeax, Freesound.org 
Under the Stars by ShadyDave, Freesound.org
